verses.roman:
prabhu-ājñā lañā vaiṣṇavera ājñā la-ilā
rāghava-sahite nibhṛte yukti karilā

synonyms: prabhu-ājñā—the order of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; lañā—taking; vaiṣṇavera ājñā—the permission of all the Vaiṣṇavas; la-ilā—he took; rāghava-sahite—with Rāghava Paṇḍita; nibhṛte—in a solitary place; yukti karilā—he consulted.
translation: After taking leave of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu and then all the other Vaiṣṇavas, Srī Raghunātha dāsa consulted secretly with Rāghava Paṇḍita.
